param.name: query
param.value: select distinct(?uri) ?label ?cell ?address where { graph ?g { ?uri <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/dul/DUL.owl#Place> . ?uri <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?label . ?uri <http://data.linkedevents.org/def/location#cell> ?cell . ?uri <http://schema.org/location> ?loc . ?loc <http://schema.org/streetAddress> ?address . } filter( !contains(str(?g), "http://3cixty.com/milan/events") ) filter( !contains(str(?g), "http://3cixty.com/milan/places") ) filter( contains(str(?g), "http://3cixty.com/milan/") ) }

param.name: query
param.value: select distinct(?uri) ?label ?cell ?address where { graph ?g { ?uri <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/dul/DUL.owl#Place> . ?uri <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?label . ?uri <http://data.linkedevents.org/def/location#cell> ?cell . ?uri <http://schema.org/location> ?loc . ?loc <http://schema.org/streetAddress> ?address . } filter( !contains(str(?g), "http://3cixty.com/milan/events") ) filter( !contains(str(?g), "http://3cixty.com/milan/places") ) filter( contains(str(?g), "http://3cixty.com/milan/") ) }
